Question: Shenzhen Lianhua Electronic Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Lianhua Electronic Co.,Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- Specialized in producing quick around prototype PCB, small and medium volume PCBs
- Can produce 1-30 layer PCBs including High frequency, High TG, Thick copper board, Aluminum substrate, flexible board, and rigid-flexible board
- Owns 400 employees and 8000 square meters producing area
- Monthly capacity of 8000 square meters and more than three thousand PCB types
- Certified by UL and ISO9001 for quality management system
- Business philosophy of "people-oriented, quality first, user is supreme, innovation, and hardworking"
- Good reputation for high quality, on-time delivery, and fast feedback
- Contact person: janiezhou@szlxhdz.com (Email & Skype)
